checkItemNameIsPresent: SELECT COUNT(s) FROM Store s WHERE s.ItemName = :itemName
updateQuantity: UPDATE Store s SET s.quantity = :quantity WHERE s.ItemName = :itemName
updatePrice: UPDATE Store s SET s.price = :price WHERE s.ItemName = :itemName
getPrice: SELECT s.price FROM Store s WHERE s.ItemName = :itemName
getQuantity: SELECT s.quantity FROM Store s WHERE s.ItemName = :itemName
updateQuantityAfterShopping: UPDATE Store s SET s.quantity = :quantity WHERE s.ItemName = :itemName
